DOC.brief_title: Sleep Dysfunction Neurocognitive Outcomes Adolescent ADHD
DOC.detailed_description: This project involve recruitment 30 adolescent ADHD control group 30 healthy adolescent without psychiatric diagnosis . Participants participate 3 phase : Screening visit , Washout/In-Home Sleep Study , Neurocognitive Assessment visit . To ensure consistency sleep schedule , three night sleep study occur weeknight school year . The neurocognitive assessment occur afternoon follow final night sleep assessment . The 2-hour screening visit conduct Duke ADHD Clinic 2608 Erwin Road , Pavilion East , Suite 300 , Durham , NC 27705 . During screen visit , participant undergo screen evaluate eligibility study . Eligible participant enter 48-hour Washout ( applicable ) 3-night Sleep Study Phase ( At Home ) . Subjects take stimulant medication initiate 3 consecutive night ambulatory ( in-home ) PSG recording , begin next Monday evening follow screen visit . Subjects instruct maintain usual sleep routines/behaviors study night . In addition , subject ask complete `` sleep diary '' morning . If subject currently take stimulant medication , instructed initiate 48-hour washout period . Subjects instruct discuss option prescribe physician prior initiate study . Subjects ask return three hour neurocognitive assessment afternoon directly follow final night sleep study . In order reduce interference school attendance , visit schedule afternoon . Subjects able take break throughout assessment request . Subjects restart ADHD medication morning follow neurocognitive assessment ( applicable ) .
